About Me

I am a software developer based in Vancouver B.C., where I am currently in my second year of study towards a Bachelor of Science Computer Science major degree at the University of British Columbia.

In my spare time, I design software for fun while also learning and adopting the latest industry strategies and workflows. Aside from software development though, my interests also include digital painting, game design and music composition.

Please feel free to explore my website and send me an email for any inquiries or if you found a bug!
